original_title: Wales - Grand Slam 2005 : Year of The Dragon
overview: "Year of the Dragon" charts every detail of Wales memorable season. Full highlights and every try from every game are included as well as exclusive interviews with Mike Ruddock, Gavin Henson, Martyn Williams, Stephen Jones, Gethin Jenkins, Tom Shanklin and Robert Sidoli. We hear first hand from the players who made it happen in the greatest year for Welsh Rugby for a generation.
title: Wales - Grand Slam 2005 : Year of The Dragon
